title: VersionPress Picks Up Backing From Credo Ventures For ‘WordPress Meets Git’ Solution
description: Anybody who has ran or developed a WordPress-powered site, be it a humble blog or something more complex, knows that it’s pretty easy to make undesirable changes. This can be either content-related or a change to the WordPress theme or plugin you’re running. While backing up is crucial, a primitive backup doesn’t always let you roll back to the exact point where everything… Read More
